Name: Mega Balls
About the game: Mega Balls, the very hard challenging game requiring the dexterity of big brains only! The Crazy Story The Evil Wizard stole your pal Good Boi... WHY!? It is up to you to get to The Tower where he resides! Game-play Navigate to the end of each level without bonking into any walls or obstacles as the force of gravity slowly pulls you down. Tackle new unbeaten levels by scouting and traversing slowly ensuring easy victory. Practice and learn previous levels so you can max out your points and shave off seconds of your time to earn an A for your grade. Try to get all A's and collect secret cookies along the way to unlock bosses and new challenges! If you intend to beat Mega Balls you will need quick thinking and the utmost precision to progress through all the tight situations that the levels create or the tight situations you created for yourself! Controls? Use the arrow or WASD keys to move, and that's it! The Super Rad Features 8 worlds with 10 levels each making for 80 handcrafted levels Additional 3 tutorial levels Grading system that reflects how you performed in terms of points and time Unique backgrounds for each level Different music track for each world 9 Bosses 12 additional challenge levels that add a twist to the game-play New enemy type introduced in almost every level Shop that offers consumable and non-consumable items to help aid you in your quest Steady 60 fps game-play Plenty of Steam Achievements to unlock Get Mega Balls!
